full_text: G-7 leaders are expected to agree to start work on a mechanism to cap the purchase price of Russian oil and a new round of sanctions against Moscow  https://t.co/1g5g0qxF9D

localize.full_text: G7首脳は、ロシアの石油購入価格に上限を設ける仕組みと、モスクワに対する新たな制裁措置の作業開始で合意する見込み https://t.co/1g5g0qxF9D
